snippet: An ill-advised visit to Cairo undercuts earlier efforts to rebuke generals and promote democracy.
abstract: Editorial contends Sec of State John Kerry's trip to Egypt served only to add to confusion over Obama administration's policy toward that critically important Arab nation; criticizes Kerry for seeming to go further than necessary to make common cause with the authoritarian generals who led the coup and are now running the country.
lead_paragraph: An ill-advised visit to Cairo undercuts earlier efforts to rebuke generals and promote democracy.
